item.description: [...] searching feverishly for a while now for a suitable middle-weight bike, and especially so since I sold the Ducati. A lot of searches yielded results that were either sold already, or too high in price. I think I [...]

item.description: whoa. sold the bike already, huh? all good. handle them priorities.
